      • compilePattern

        public static java.util.regex.Pattern compilePattern(java.lang.String regex,
                                     org.slf4j.Logger log,
                                     java.lang.String errorMessage)
        Compiles a regular expression and logs an problems to the provided log. If a compile error occures, then null is returned. This class will not rethrow the error, so that it's use in a static context will not cause a ClassNotFoundException.

      • compilePattern

        Deprecated. 
        Exists to allow an upgrade path from Commons Logging to SLF4J
